SELECT a.exam_id as examId, a.exam_name as examName, a.exam_description as examDescription, a.question_creator_id as questionCreatorId, a.exam_score as examScore, a.exam_time_limit as examTimeLimit, a.exam_start_date as examStartDate, a.exam_end_date as examEndDate, a.exam_switch as examSwitch, b.nickname as createname from exam a,t_user b where b.id=a.question_creator_id and a.exam_type=0
and a.question_creator_id=#{userid}

SELECT a.exam_id as examId, a.exam_name as examName, a.exam_description as examDescription, a.exam_score as examScore, a.exam_time_limit as examTimeLimit, a.exam_start_date as examStartDate, a.exam_end_date as examEndDate, a.exam_switch as examSwitch from exam a,exam_user b where a.exam_switch!=3
and a.exam_id=b.exam_id and b.user_id=#{userid}

SELECT a.exam_id as examId, a.exam_name as examName, a.exam_description as examDescription, a.question_creator_id as questionCreatorId, a.exam_score as examScore, a.exam_time_limit as examTimeLimit, a.exam_start_date as examStartDate, a.exam_end_date as examEndDate, a.exam_switch as examSwitch, b.nickname as createname from exam a,t_user b where b.id=a.question_creator_id and a.exam_type=1 and a.question_creator_id=#{userid}
